name: <Candy Corn Jello Shots>
description: <Jello shots to help get you in the Halloween spirit!>
directions: <Pour 1 cup of water and 1 envelope of unflavored gelatin into a saucepan. Heat on a stove over medium heat, while stirring occasionally until all the gelatin powder dissolves.>
<Remove the pan from heat and add sweetened condensed milk. Mix well.>
<Add 1/2 cup of vodka. Make sure the mixture is completely cooled so the alcohol isn't cooked out.>
<Fill each shot glass up 1/3 of the way with the condensed mixture. Then, refrigerate the shots for 30 minutes or until firm.>
<In a new saucepan, pour 1 cup of water and 1 envelope of unflavored gelatin. Repeat step 1, stirring until the gelatin is fully dissolved.>
<Remove the pan from heat and add your box of orange Jell-O mix. Stir until completely dissolved.>
<Add 1/2 cup of vodka and stir until combined. Then, pour your orange Jello-O mixture to 2/3 of the way of each shot glass. Refrigerate for another 30-40 minutes.>
<Repeat steps 5 and 6 with the lemon Jell-O, filling the shot glasses up to the top. Refrigerate for another 30 minutes.>
